message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product! I think you'll really love it.
I'm really interested in the product, but $150 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I can see if I can do a bit better. However, I still need to make a profit, so I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. I'm really interested in the product and I think it's worth it to me at that price.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal. I can do $100, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great product, and I think it's worth it to you.
